CustomField.description: Original amount due before taxes less discounts as calculated at creation/cancellation OR 2nd to last amount after updates to either Amount Due Before Taxes and Discounts or Discounts fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Original amount due before taxes less discounts as calculated at creation/cancellation OR 2nd to last amount after updates to either Amount Due Before Taxes and Discounts or Discounts fields.
CustomField.label: Org Charges After Org Discounts
